org.aavso.tools.vstar.ui.mediator
Class StarInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.aavso.tools.vstar.ui.mediator.StarInfo

public class StarInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains information about a star. Some or all of its members may be absent, so each is null by default.

Constructor Detail

StarInfo

public StarInfo(java.lang.String designation,
                java.lang.String auid,
                java.lang.Double period,
                java.lang.Double epoch,
                java.lang.String varType,
                java.lang.String spectralType,
                java.lang.String discoverer)
Constructor.

Parameters:
designation - A name or designation for the star.
auid - The star's unique identifier (AAVSO unique ID).
period - The star's period, if known.
epoch - The star's (corresponding to period for phase plot purposes) epoch, if known, as a Heliocentric Julian Date.

StarInfo

public StarInfo(java.lang.String designation,
                java.lang.String auid)
Constructor. All but designation and AUID are null.

Parameters:
designation - A name or designation for the star.
auid - The star's unique identifier (AAVSO unique ID).
